name: Offensive-Defensive Synergy
description: Training to seamlessly blend offensive strikes with defensive counters, using dual-weapon transitions, shields, and tactical redirections.

workout_groups.name: Fundamentals of Offensive-Defensive Balance
workout_groups.description: Building the core principles of attacking and defending in the same motion.

workouts.name: Basic Sword & Buckler Flow
workouts.description: Strike with the sword while keeping the buckler in defensive readiness, alternating between attack and defense.

workouts.name: Knife Evasion & Counter Cut
workouts.description: Practice knife-based evasion movements followed by immediate counter-slashes.

workouts.name: Basic Parry & Strike Drill
workouts.description: Parry an incoming strike with the off-hand and respond with a quick counterattack.

workouts.name: Buckler Deflection into Wrist Blade Counter
workouts.description: Redirect an attack with the buckler, then extend the wrist blade for a close-range counter.

workout_groups.name: Reactive Defense to Offensive Flow
workout_groups.description: Developing the ability to instinctively counter an opponentâ€™s attack with immediate offensive response.

workouts.name: Sword & Buckler Counter Timing
workouts.description: Time your blocks with immediate slashes, training precision and speed.

workouts.name: Knife-Only Counter Flow
workouts.description: Practice knife parrying, redirection, and immediate countering in a continuous motion.

workouts.name: Blade Control During Deflection
workouts.description: Use minimal energy to deflect a weapon attack while keeping your own blade in a position to counter.

workouts.name: Defensive Buckler Feint into Attack
workouts.description: Fake a defensive buckler movement to bait an attack, then immediately strike with the sword.

workout_groups.name: High-Speed Defensive Adaptation
workout_groups.description: Training defensive responses under high-pressure situations where timing and reflexes are critical.

workouts.name: Multi-Strike Parry & Attack Drill
workouts.description: Defend against multiple strikes in succession while maintaining balance and counter opportunities.

workouts.name: Ambidextrous Block & Counter
workouts.description: Use both dominant and non-dominant hands to block and counter seamlessly.

workouts.name: Wrist Blade Retraction to Knife Follow-Up
workouts.description: Use a quick wrist blade strike, retract it, then immediately transition to knife combat.

workouts.name: Evade, Block, and Counter Sparring
workouts.description: Train in live defensive-offensive scenarios, where every move must flow into the next.
